website_summaries.verdict: Realistic crow distress and fighting calls that make turkeys gobble and reveal their location.
pros: Simple and quick operation using a built-in reed you blow into
The resulting call is loud from large distances
The call itself is weather-resistant and fits into extremely small spaces
cons: Lacks directions to properly tune and set up

customer_reviews.title: Good for crow calling not for crow talking
customer_reviews.text: Good for crow calling, calls the crows rite away BUT not a crow talker only use it once to call the crows or else it will scare it away once they're near you. there was a crow at my job that I was feeding everyday he was so comfortable coming close to me and eating near me then I used the crow caller while I was next to it to try and talk or communicate and it scared it away. When he's not around all I need is 1-3 whistles and he's rite there
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: good call
customer_reviews.text: Called in a murder of crows 1st time I used it.. Killed the alpha dead and then called em back and killed the #2.... Just a good call....
customer_reviews.author: Reelax

customer_reviews.title: hello crow goodbye pigeons
customer_reviews.text: we've been cursed with pigeons roosting under our solar panels. It is almost impossible to find someone to clean the piles of nasty pigeon droppings ( hard for seniors to climb on a roof to shovel nasties off). we noticed local crows have been hunting pigeons so we got this crow turkey call to try. it really scares the nasty pigeons off the roof! so long pigeon poop!
customer_reviews.author: lilibet

customer_reviews.title: Does not sound too real.
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried it outside yet, but I have taken it apart to adjust the reed. No matter how much I adjust it, it just does not sound like a real crow caww. It might still work, and I will update this review when I do try it outside on crows.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built, had to use a wooden spoon handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Rating for sound and quality, haven’t taken it in the woods yet. Nicely built, had to use a wooden spoon handle to get it apart to adjust the reed. Lowered it all the way for the highest pitch, sounds the most like a crow to me.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it could be good but doesn't sound great but ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems like it could be good but doesn't sound great but if the box. The packaging says to tune it but gives no instructions how. I'm afraid I will break if I just yank on it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Montoya

customer_reviews.title: great beginner set up
customer_reviews.text: love the call but the sound is limiting in my personal opinion. I doesn't have the deep rumble / deep perrrr that crows give off. for distressed calling it does the job. I use it for turkey hunting so I don't need to be too technical about it however overall I find the sound a little to "synthetic"
customer_reviews.author: D0m

customer_reviews.title: OK but not as good as other crow calls
customer_reviews.text: It takes a lot of practice to get this call to sound close to a crow call. Not nearly as good as the call it replaced. Spend a little extra money if you want a call that's a little easier to tune and use.
customer_reviews.author: VaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Took some tinkering but great product
customer_reviews.text: It took a little figuring out and a video to see how to take the apart to adjust the reed. I had to hammer the black part out with a round dowel, but once I could manipulate that, the sound became much truer to a crow and liked it much.
customer_reviews.author: Mike aka HuntFishDOE

customer_reviews.title: Not quite deep enough for our local crows/blackbirds/ravens/whaddyajiggies
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and tried to augment with my voice, but still not sounding as deep as the overhead calls from the eucalyptus trees. I have sparked scatterings but not curiosity.
customer_reviews.author: freerangechicken

customer_reviews.title: Great quality durable fits in the hand nicely
customer_reviews.text: It sounds more like a duck call until you use it right. Like any instrument it takes practice. Quality build. Very durable. Compact easy-to-use fits in the hand nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Horus R. IceRaven

customer_reviews.title: Creates quite a stir!
customer_reviews.text: Within seconds of using for the first time I was hearing distant crows responding to the call. Just a quick minute later there were six crows circling and 'cawing' overhead.
customer_reviews.author: Al C.

customer_reviews.title: Works good for me.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a crow to me. I am over 250 lbs, and all I need to do is blow in it and it sounds good. I got a response from the local crows right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: 427Troy

customer_reviews.title: Sets 'Em Off
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes an absolute cacophony of sound. You wanna stir up the woods ... blow hard on this call. Everything perks up and shouts back.
customer_reviews.author: ChongYon Fyfe

customer_reviews.title: Nice and load
customer_reviews.text: This is similar to other crow calls I've use. The quality seems good. But you can blow it loader than others I've used.
customer_reviews.author: wanderingwayne

customer_reviews.title: Great tone
customer_reviews.text: Great call, you have a range of sounds you can make with it easily without any hard blowing. Calls in crows and nice toms with little effort. Be ready when you use this, the results arrive quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Heard some crows calling in the neighborhood. I used this call to respond. Sure enough, within 10 minutes they were in the trees above me. I left them some unsalted peanuts and they're now eating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great call
customer_reviews.text: Great call very loud and gets the thunder chickens gobbling. I highly recommend this call and you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unclear Description
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as a turkey call. When the package arrived, it was clearly marked as a crow call. While inexpensive, it is totally worthless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce S, Spence

customer_reviews.title: Great locator!!
customer_reviews.text: Great crow call! Love it! Loud!! Gets the crows going, makes that turkey gobble! Great locator! Bought 3
customer_reviews.author: Missy R

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in mail this past sat , right out of the box I blew it , 7 crows , including circle back right back at me Going on crow hunt this coming sat
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loud for getting those Toms to gooble on roost.
customer_reviews.text: Works great to locate turkeys before first light while they’re still roosting. Really loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mrspiceman

customer_reviews.title: Nice caller.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is so original, I had a flock of crows around my house within minutes. Highly recommend if you want crows. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Thankuhal

customer_reviews.title: Gave these to my friends two boys for Christmas, ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave these to my friends two boys for Christmas, drove him nuts for the day but we called in a lot of crows. I have to say it works and 6 year old boys can blow this all day.
customer_reviews.author: nigel nary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great locator call. It did its job a few days ago. Gobble, Gobble, Gobble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: First time using one of these and I picked it up in no time
customer_reviews.author: Josh Heidebrink

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My son's face as he "called" the crows and they came was priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Carr

customer_reviews.title: It sounds like a crow
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very effective. I even got a turkey response at sunset with it when I forgot to bring my owl call with me.
customer_reviews.author: Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: Tough to remove mouth peice to adjust reed. Not as high pitched as a crow, it's just ok. It will find a gobble, but could sound a little more natural in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel G Culmone

customer_reviews.title: Not a crow call. It's a DUCK call.
customer_reviews.text: Crow's don't sound like the sound this thing makes. Unless crow's like water and fly south for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony COS

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, who is a big outdoorsman, and he raves about it. A compliment from him is really rare so I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Haney

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works turkeys responded to it. Seems a little flimsy but with caution it should last
customer_reviews.author: rogsta1984

customer_reviews.title: Caw, caw. Order s to LGE for this ...
customer_reviews.text: Caw, caw. Order s to LGE for this season but next it will be on point.
customer_reviews.author: F.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good call.
customer_reviews.text: Solid call. Definitely shock gobbled a few turkeys with it. Haven't used too much but seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hendon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds real and it’s loud
customer_reviews.text: Personally I have not located any turkeys with it yet that was the intent but that does not mean it doesn’t work it sounds very realistic and it’s loud
customer_reviews.author: darin maddox

customer_reviews.title: They com like crazy
customer_reviews.text: Great call brought in lots of crows this year excited for next
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Quite realistic when you learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a crow with some practice
customer_reviews.text: You can adjust the reed and with a little practice this thing sounds fairly realistic. Cup your hand over the end for a more realistic call. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for New Year's Eve
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a party favor, no response from crows at all
customer_reviews.author: Garry Owen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, crows called back. No look yet with a turkey .
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It'll do.
customer_reviews.text: You gotta work it, but it works. May need a little adjusting when you first receive it. If it sounds like a duck your doing it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: A-WAX

customer_reviews.title: but once I got the hang of it I was sounding just like a crow
customer_reviews.text: The sound is a little lighter, but once I got the hang of it I was sounding just like a crow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A VERY EASY CALL TO LEARN TO USE + SOUNDS GREAT !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Howard J Petroski

customer_reviews.title: Awsome worth it
customer_reviews.text: Easy i called it 10 times and in minutes crows came at 3 oclock 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Shawna R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing how well it works....
customer_reviews.text: If I can hear other crows calling, I can call them in with my Hammerin Crow Call...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Does the jo9b with a little practice but have had no crows around here respond to it, The hook owl one I got works great, This I am unsure of,
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: but not the best Crow call I have heard
customer_reviews.text: work well, but not the best Crow call I have heard.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Macmahon

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to blow and get crows to come In
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This is very good my brother saw it in action today and said ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried this thing out today, had crows calling back and coming into me. This is very good my brother saw it in action today and said he's going to go get one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Calls em right in! Use the scratchy call and it works every time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This call is very loud. I bought it too make a turkey gobble . Hadn't tried that yet , but it sure makes the crows hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Libbey

customer_reviews.title: Mmm. If it seems too...
customer_reviews.text: One days use and I threw it in the hemlocks. Worked initially out of the package. @12 hours in cup holder in console of the Jeep, then second time in woods.. lousy excuse for a party favor. Tried to twist out reed section with my teeth and cracked it. Side arm toss into the hemlocks while scouting with my buddy from NH. All in all, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg W. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for crow watchers?
customer_reviews.text: Let's say I don't totally understand the principals or intended use for this device. I thought it would call crows to the call. If a crow is within sight all I see is a crow that can't wait to put more distance between this sound and himself. In the right hands it might be a hunters delight; suppose that leave crow watcher out - keep using my binoculars...
customer_reviews.author: Pat Park

customer_reviews.title: Crow call
customer_reviews.text: I use this to call turkeys. Works alright. Might need to adjust the reed. Solid and a decent size. When using this call, I am reminded of the quote from Hook, "He can fight, he can fly and he can (insert crow sound)!"
customer_reviews.author: KayakFisherman

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well, Authentic Sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this to call in crows to my bird feeder. It sounds very natural and is easy to use. Projects a good distance. Durable and comfortable. There are notches in the mouthpiece so that you can hold it in your teeth to keep your hands free. The crows reacted to it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wussow

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: This call is pretty cool. I was planning on using it for turkey locating, but haven't had a chance to bring it out in the field yet. One problem with it is it sounds kind of like a duck call. The instructions say to adjust the reed, but I'm not sure how to get to it. Anyways the kids love it and you get crows calling back if you do it right (YouTube videos have good instructions for other calls)
customer_reviews.author: Steve P.

customer_reviews.title: Opening day of turkey season a good two year old tom loved the sound
customer_reviews.text: Opening day of turkey season a good two year old tom loved the sound, had him going for an hour before I got him, I knew right where he was the whole time because of this - he must have gobbled 100 times or more to it. The next four days I didn't have too much response to the call, but the first one was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Louisvillian

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put it to use just yet, easy to blow and sounds really good to me. I will put it to the test in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for a beginner. Loud accurate representation. Worked to call in crows.
customer_reviews.author: Brewale4me

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great call! I lost it so I guess it lol have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

product_meta.title: Hunters Specialties H.S. Strut Hammerin Crow Turkey Locator Call
